sentences.en: ...in the 1960s, when sexual love had been divested of sin.
sentences.cn: ...在二十世纪60年代，性爱不再被当做犯罪的年代。

sentences.en: As a result, they have moved to divest themselves of losing acquisitions.
sentences.cn: 于是他们采取措施来摆脱那些使他们得不偿失的企业.

sentences.en: He attempted to divest himself of all responsibilities for the decision.
sentences.cn: 他力图摆脱掉作出该项决定的一切责任.

sentences.en: He cannot divest himself of this idea.
sentences.cn: 他不能抛弃他的这个想法.

sentences.en: His ( Arafat ) traditional mentors were now set to divest themselves of him.
sentences.cn: 是不是在说阿拉法特的导师 ( 能说是智囊团吗 ) 现在都纷纷被剥夺了权力吗?

sentences.en: I cannot divest myself of the idea.
I divest myself of my uniform.
I shall never Be aBle entirely to divest myself of this feeling.
sentences.cn: 我将永远无法完全放弃这些感觉.

sentences.en: If you wish to be a happy man, you must divest yourself of pride.
sentences.cn: 若想做个快乐的人就得舍弃骄傲自大的心态.

sentences.en: Miss Abbot turned to divest a stout leg of the necessary ligature.
sentences.cn: 艾博特小姐转而从她粗壮的腿上,解下那条必不可少的带子.

sentences.en: pressure on hospitals to divest tobacco-related stocks
sentences.cn: 要求医院转让烟草类股票的压力
她企图推卸自己的责任.

sentences.en: The company divested itself of its oil interests.
sentences.cn: 这家公司从石油生意中抽身。

sentences.en: These men cannot entirely divest themselves of hunanity.
sentences.cn: 这种人也不是全无人道.

sentences.en: They have divested rituals of their original meaning.
sentences.cn: 这些仪式的原意已被他们丧尽。

sentences.en: Where should we invest or divest in production capacity?
sentences.cn: 在生产能力方面我们应该投资在哪里?

trans.tran_en: If you divest yourself of something that you own or are responsible for, you get rid of it or stop being responsible for it

trans.tran_cn: 剥夺，脱去（衣服），2。从…取去…，1。（给某人）脱衣服
trans.tran_en: if a company divests, it sells some of its  asset s  ,  investment s  etc
